TASK: Craft an item of type: anvil
inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 3, "index": 10}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 35, "index": 14}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "bell", "quantity": 58, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 31}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 29, "index": 33}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "cyan_terracotta", "quantity": 49, "index": 38}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}, {"type": "baked_potato", "quantity": 51, "index": 40}]

thought: I need to craft an anvil. An anvil requires placing 3 iron blocks in a 'T' shape in the crafting table. The first iron block should be placed in the top left corner of the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1
